scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager . "Google Music Client" --out=dist/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.34.0 --icon=assets/icon.icns --ignore=dist/ --ignore=electron-*
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager . "Google Music Client" --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.34.0 --icon=assets/icon.ico --ignore=dist/ --ignore=electron-*
scripts.pack: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run build:osx && electron-builder "dist/osx/Google Music Client-darwin-x64/Google Music Client.app" --platform=osx --out="dist/osx" --config=packager.json
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:win && electron-builder "dist/win/Google Music Client-win32-ia32" --platform=win --out="dist/win" --config=packager.json
